ygData.subject: Re: JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: Very good point, never assume especially with this company. :) But the way I see it, if we couldn t cast it on others, then it wouldn t ask us to pick a
ygData.messageBody:
Very good point, never assume especially with this company. :) But the
way I see it, if we couldn't cast it on others, then it wouldn't ask
us to pick a target.

Hey, I just got an idea. When I get back to a town, I am going to find
the PoD and cast indentify on him (assuming he is holding his staff).
See of that works. :)

I do agree that we seem to have gotten totally shafted on being able
to cast (buff) on other people. I understand it's not our speciality,
and all, but my god I'm not talking about cleric/pally type buffs.
Sight and heat/cold/magic resistance would be great to cast on party
members.


MFerrulo@... wrote:
>
> From: MFerrulo@...
>
> In a message dated 10/11/99 1:49:19 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> cobb@... writes:
>
> <<
> I have never tried it on other people, but I don't see why it wouldn't
> work on them either.
> >>
>
> Well I wouldn't assume this. Hardly any of our spells work on other people.
> Does it make sense that we can cast See Invisi on others but not Heat Sight?
> Also, keep in mind that Identify Magic spell is gonna be taken out of the
> game soon and replaced with a new spell (all who have Identify magic will
> auto recieve new spell I think).
>
> Wizaro Wrathcaster
> 28th Flame of Solusek's Fire
